name: Further relief upon judgment
text: Further relief based on a declaratory judgment may be granted whenever necessary or proper, after reasonable notice and hearing, against any adverse party whose rights have been adjudicated by the judgment. [L 1921, c 162, §3; RL 1925, §2920; RL 1935, §4222; RL 1945, §9973; RL 1955, §228-3; HRS ; am L 1972, c 89, §1(e)]
